lyrics.stanza: Savior, lead me, this I pray, In the Spirit all the day; Walking in the light of life, I would cease from all my strife.
Lead me, lead me, Savior, lead me, this I pray; Deeply in the stream of life, Lead me, Savior, in Thy way.
Thou as life in me indeed, By the law of life dost lead; When Thou reignest in Thy might, All my darkness turns to light.
Liberating Spirit, Thou, Wholly regulate me now; Thus my mind Thou wilt renew And Thy will I'll fully know.
